blog.name: villanelleismyeviltwin
blog.title: Killing Eve is My Obsession
blog.description: Villaneve obsess with each other. I’m obsessed with them, especially Villanelle. She is my evil twin and I love her to the moon and back! Everything on this show is fucking genius! So, this blog is dedicated to anything related to Killing Eve, Jodie Comer, and Sandra Oh only — not multi-fandom. If you’re looking for Killing Eve stuff, just get on board. I make gifsets when I have free time. Visit My Site if you'd like. I do some shitty stuff there LOL!

summary: Just finished binge watching “Fleabag” and really enjoyed it. I understood now why Killing Eve season 1 is so fucking awesome!...
body:
Just finished binge watching “Fleabag” and really enjoyed it. I understood now why Killing Eve season 1 is so fucking awesome! Phoebe Waller-Bridge is such a true genius writer!

Hope she will choose the right show runner for KE3 like she did with Emerald Fennell for KE2.

reblog.comment:
Just finished binge watching “Fleabag” and really enjoyed it. I understood now why Killing Eve season 1 is so fucking awesome! Phoebe Waller-Bridge is such a true genius writer!

Hope she will choose the right show runner for KE3 like she did with Emerald Fennell for KE2.

trail.content_raw:

She wore:
Blk Dnm Leather Jacket 5 | sold out
Calvin Luo Pullover...
body:
Jodie Comer for MONROWE MAGAZINE | May 2017 Issue | Outfit 1

She wore:

Blk Dnm Leather Jacket 5 | sold out

Calvin Luo Pullover From the AW 2017 Collection

Closed Official Two Tone Skinny High Rise Jeans | sold out

Manolo Blahnik Black Suede Pointed Toe Pumps | $695

Photography by Chad Davis

Styled by Christian Stroble

title: VILLANEVE (KILLING EVE) FIC RECOMMENDATION MASTERLIST
body:
tag team back again!

because of the sheer amount of fics that have been written since s2 came out, and the lack of organization of the last list i made—here’s a brand new updated list! as always, these are only my recommendations, so this is not a comprehensive list of all villaneve writings. no double listings—if a fic isn’t in one category, it’s definitely in another. also, please pay attention to the tags/warnings as i haven’t marked nsfw this time.

50+ ORGANIZED FICS UNDER THE CUT

ONE-SHOTS

standalone fics.

—“cloudwatching” by isawet (1/1)

—”Tempt My Trouble” by Wemmabby (1/1)

—”Nacre” by willowbilly (1/1)

—“Haven’t I told you so (a million or more times)” by pengukat (1/1)

—”You’re The Best Kind Of Bad Something” by clarkes_murphy (1/1)

—”when the sun sets we’re both the same” by girlwitharrows (1/1)

—”Opera d’arte” by thegingermidget (1/1)

—”Life in Technicolour” by Selenay (1/1)

—”Look What You Made Me Do” by orphan_account (1/1)

—”Permanency” by Panny (1/1)

—”it’s in the colors” by Toucanna (1/1)

—”you know i’m such a fool for you” by dollsome (1/1)

—”you have been a hurricane to me” by fmradio (1/1)

—”Obsessions” by weakinteraction (1/1)

—”I Really Am Your Color” by heyitsathrowaway (1/1)

—”Eating of the tree, etc” by PoeticallyIrritating (1/1)

—”Room 201″ by almostfantasia (1/1)

—”Did We Do It?” by Arriva (1/1)

—”The Pretender” by TheEvangelion (1/1)

—”Your Ex-Lover Is Dead” by sophiahelix (1/1)

—”I Could Be Better, But” by thegingermidget (1/1)

—”miracles are just too damn hard to find” by Anonymous (1/1)

—”Normal” by gutsandglitter (1/1)

MULTI-CHAPTER FICS

—”Professional Boundaries” by yotoob (39/39)

—”Triangles” by yotoob (2/2)

—”for hire” by almostfantasia (INCOMPLETE—4/?)

—”Different For Us” by BeginToFray (INCOMPLETE—19/?)

—”the shepherd’s folly” by ifyouresure (3/3)

—”Now I Don’t Feel Those Kinds of Things” by saltandsunscreen (INCOMPLETE—5/?)

—”Virtues Uncounted” by KillCommander (Atticus) (3/3)

—”and definitely maybe i will live to love” by Boxedblondes (5/5)

—”leavin’ a wake, leavin’ a big, big scar” by Boxedblondes  (INCOMPLETE—6/12)

—”this is what you wanted” by dollsome (3/3)

—”Come to Me at My Worst” by anamatics (INCOMPLETE—3/5)

—”manie sans délire” by behindthec (INCOMPLETE—4/10)

—”Of Love and La Villanelle” by melvncholymvmi (INCOMPLETE—6/50)

SERIES

organized line-ups of multiple fics by the same author.

—mad girl’s love song by foxbones

  • PT. 1 “exit seraphim” (1/1)
  • PT. 2 “a murder of birds” (1/1)
  • PT. 3 “only by dark” (INCOMPLETE—12/13 chapters)

BY AUTHOR

authors with a larger collection of eve polastri/villanelle fics.

—piggy09

  • “now if we’re talking body” (1/1)
  •  “La Dolce Vita” (1/1)
  • “Hurricane Drunk” (1/1)

—alicekittridge

  • “She Knows So Much” (2/2)
  • “Saturday Visits/Good Mornings” (1/1)
  • “Walk-Ins Welcome” (1/1)

—humanveil

  • “the way you touch my soul (is so damn evil)” (1/1)
  • “like the halls of your heart” (1/1)
  • “heart made of glass (my mind, of stone)” (1/1)
  • “dual” (1/1)
  • “here comes a rising tide” (1/1)
  • “(shiver in) anticipation” (1/1)
  • “poppy” (1/1)
  • “cat and mouse” (1/1)

—zozo

  • “all i see are tomorrows” (7/7)
  • ”some hearts, sometimes, leave blind” (9/9)
  • ”all of your lives unled” (2/2)

50+ ORGANIZED FICS UNDER THE CUT

—”Virtues Uncounted” by KillCommander (Atticus) (3/3)

—”and definitely maybe i will live to love” by Boxedblondes (5/5)

—”leavin’ a wake, leavin’ a big, big scar” by Boxedblondes  (INCOMPLETE—6/12)

—”this is what you wanted” by dollsome (3/3)

—”Come to Me at My Worst” by anamatics (INCOMPLETE—3/5)

—”manie sans délire” by behindthec (INCOMPLETE—4/10)

—”Of Love and La Villanelle” by melvncholymvmi (INCOMPLETE—6/50)

SERIES

organized line-ups of multiple fics by the same author.

—mad girl’s love song by foxbones

  • PT. 1 “exit seraphim” (1/1)
  • PT. 2 “a murder of birds” (1/1)
  • PT. 3 “only by dark” (INCOMPLETE—12/13 chapters)

BY AUTHOR

authors with a larger collection of eve polastri/villanelle fics.

  • “now if we’re talking body” (1/1)
  •  “La Dolce Vita” (1/1)
  • “Hurricane Drunk” (1/1)

—alicekittridge

  • “She Knows So Much” (2/2)
  • “Saturday Visits/Good Mornings” (1/1)
  • “Walk-Ins Welcome” (1/1)

—humanveil

  • “the way you touch my soul (is so damn evil)” (1/1)
  • “like the halls of your heart” (1/1)
  • “heart made of glass (my mind, of stone)” (1/1)
  • “dual” (1/1)
  • “here comes a rising tide” (1/1)
  • “(shiver in) anticipation” (1/1)
  • “poppy” (1/1)
  • “cat and mouse” (1/1)

—zozo

  • “all i see are tomorrows” (7/7)
  • ”some hearts, sometimes, leave blind” (9/9)
  • ”all of your lives unled” (2/2)
trail.content_abstract:
tag team back again!

because of the sheer amount of fics that have been written since s2 came out, and the lack of organization of the last list i made—here’s a brand new updated list! as always, these are only my recommendations, so this is not a comprehensive list of all villaneve writings. no double listings—if a fic isn’t in one category, it’s definitely in another. also, please pay attention to the tags/warnings as i haven’t marked nsfw this time.

50+ ORGANIZED FICS UNDER THE CUT
